DataElement.preferredName: Investigational Anticoagulant Agent And/Or Chemotherapy Agent Receive Yes No Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates whether a patient has or is receiving any other investigation, anticoagulation and/or chemotherapy agents that meet the criteria for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Investigational Anticoagulant Agent And/Or Chemotherapy Agent Receive
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: In the process of being studied; experimental._Agents that prevent blood clotting. Naturally occurring agents in the blood are included only when they are used as drugs._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._To take, accept, or get something offered.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Investigational Anticoagulant Agent And/Or Chemotherapy Agent
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In the process of being studied; experimental.:Agents that prevent blood clotting. Naturally occurring agents in the blood are included only when they are used as drugs.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Concepts.definition: In the process of being studied; experimental.
Any agent capable of preventing blood clot formation.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.
